Partly cloudy skies PERIOD Low 44F PERIOD Winds light and variable PERIOD

Updated November     pm





Vegabonds consists of five membersDaniel Allen Richard Forehand Paul Bruens Beau Cooper and Bryan Harris PERIOD

Up and coming rock bands will mark their second collaboration when The Vegabonds along with  Nights perform at the State Theatre in Greenville tonight at  PERIOD The cost to attend the concert is . pERIOD

Formed at Auburn University in  The Vegabonds immediately started touring other schools and nightclubs in the southeast quickly developing a reputation through word of mouth with their mix of Southern rock and country into a style referred to by vocalist Daniel Allen as New South rock PERIOD

The group has since relocated to Nashville releasing five records and opening for acts such as Lynyrd Skynyrd and Gregg Allman PERIOD They have also embarked on three European tours as well as performing at major music festivals including Magnolia Fest and Taste of Randolph while maintaining a busy schedule of  shows a year PERIOD

Last year marked the beginning of a new chapter for the band PERIOD They signed a record deal with Los Angeles based label Blue Elan Records along with a publishing deal with Blue Water Music in Nashville PERIOD

Allen said The Vegabonds is such a unique group in the rock genre and they pride themselves on blending various styles of music with the different musical backgrounds throughout the band PERIOD

All five members of our band have different musical backgrounds so we pride ourselves on blending various styles PERIOD We have a great mix of Southern Rock Americana indie rock and singersongwriter songs Allen said PERIOD

Allen also commented on the bands prior experiences playing in Greenville as well as the opportunity to play in the State Theatre for the first time PERIOD

Weve felt right at home in Greenville PERIOD Weve never had the pleasure of rocking the stage at the State Theatre so thats always a blast when its the first time Allen said PERIOD

According to Allen the bands plans for the immediate future include two new projects one of which is a live album PERIOD The group will also be performing at the Summer Solstice music festival in June in Milwaukee Wisconsin PERIOD

For  Nights this will be their first visit to Greenville PERIOD Formed in  by a group of friends from the College of Charleston in Charleston South Carolina PERIOD The band began by performing at house parties in the local area becoming popular with their psychedelic selfpenned songs influenced by the Rolling Stones PERIOD

The group has collaborated with The Vegabonds on multiple occasions playing shows in Charleston and Charlotte North Carolina PERIOD

Johnny Holliday guitarist for  Nights talked about the bands roots and how far theyve come since forming PERIOD

Weve toured all over PERIOD Weve played bad shows and good shows and its been a blast Holliday said PERIOD

Holliday also explained what the band has to offer in terms of a concert experience for newcomers PERIOD

We just have a lot of energy on stage and were really passionate about the songs were playing Holliday said PERIOD

For more information on the concert visit the events Facebook page PERIOD
